faqs.question: What surfaces can I install PVC products on?
faqs.answer:
Clean, dry, flat surfaces including:
- Drywall, concrete, plywood (for wall installations with PEGATEC)
- Structural framing (for ceilings, roofing, facades with mechanical fastening)
- Level subfloors (for SPC flooring with click-lock system)

faqs.question: Do I need a professional installer?
faqs.answer:
Depends on the product:
- DIY-Friendly: SPC flooring, self-adhesive wall panels, some laminates
- Professional Recommended: Roofing, exterior facades, structural ceiling systems
- Safety First: Any installation above ground level or on roofs requires professional installation for safety and warranty compliance

faqs.question: How do I clean and maintain PVC products?
faqs.answer:
Very easy maintenance:
- Regular Cleaning: Wipe with damp cloth and mild soap
- Stain Removal: Use neutral detergent, avoid abrasive cleaners
- No Special Treatment: No waxing, sealing, or refinishing needed
- Longevity: Products maintain appearance with minimal care

faqs.question: Are these products suitable for wet areas?
faqs.answer:
Yes! 100% waterproof. Perfect for:
- Bathrooms (walls, floors, ceilings)
- Kitchens (backsplashes, walls, floors)
- Pool areas (decking, walls, outdoor spaces)
- Laundry rooms
- Commercial wet areas (restaurants, hotels, spas)

faqs.question: What if I find defects after receiving my order?
faqs.answer:
Important warranty guidelines:
- Inspect ALL products upon delivery before signing receipt
- Report missing items or shipping damage immediately
- Do NOT install products with visible defects
- Contact sales team immediately if defects are found
- Warranty excludes defects visible before installation
- Follow technical datasheets for proper use and installation
